page.title: 09LEISURE AROUND ROMSEY
page.content: One of Romsey's best hobbies is to go fishing. It is very good for salmon and trout. All the lakes and rivers around Romsey are well stocked with fish all the year round. In Romsey altogether there are nine lakes well stocked with roach, trout and many other types of fish. In Romsey all the fish are in good condition in rivers. If fish are caught and not being put back the owners of the rivers stock their fish in the rivers at least twice every year. Another hobby in Romsey is bmxing and nearly all the kids in Romsey have a bmx for their own. There also is a track for them to go on in Viney Avenue. It is good because it keeps them off the roads and it keeps them out of trouble.
